Integer value check.

Source: R/utilities.R
integer_check.Rd

integer_check() throws an error if n is not equal to a positive valued integer.

Usage

integer_check(n)

Arguments

n

An integer.

Value

An integer. If no error is thrown during evaluation, then integer_check() returns the n argument.
